classData.comment:
/**
 * @summary Performs semantic search against the knowledge base.
 *
 * This service is responsible for performing semantic search against the knowledge base.
 * It takes a natural language query, generates an embedding for it, and queries the
 * ChromaDB vector store. It then applies a sophisticated scoring and ranking algorithm
 * to the results to provide the most relevant source files to the user.
 *
 * @class Neo.ai.mcp.server.knowledge-base.services.QueryService
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 * @singleton
 */
classData.summary:
Performs semantic search against the knowledge base.

This service is responsible for performing semantic search against the knowledge base.
It takes a natural language query, generates an embedding for it, and queries the
ChromaDB vector store. It then applies a sophisticated scoring and ranking algorithm
to the results to provide the most relevant source files to the user.
classData.name: QueryService

classData.description: Ensures the service is ready by waiting for ChromaManager.
classData.name: initAsync

classData.comment:
/**
     * Retrieves the static class hierarchy from the pre-generated JSON file.
     * @param {Object} params
     * @param {String} params.root Root class name to filter the hierarchy (e.g., 'Neo.component.Base').
     * @returns {Promise<Object>} The class hierarchy map or subtree.
     */
classData.description: Retrieves the static class hierarchy from the pre-generated JSON file.

params.description: Root class name to filter the hierarchy (e.g., 'Neo.component.Base').
params.name: params.root

returns.description: The class hierarchy map or subtree.

classData.name: getClassHierarchy

classData.comment:
/**
     * Performs a semantic search on the knowledge base using a natural language query.
     * Returns a scored and ranked list of the most relevant source files.
     * @param {String} query        The natural language search query.
     * @param {String} [type='all'] The content type to filter by. Valid values: 'all', 'blog', 'guide', 'src', 'example', 'ticket', 'release'.
     * @param {Number} [limit=25]   The maximum number of results to return.
     * @returns {Promise<Object>} A promise that resolves to the query results object.
     */
classData.description: Performs a semantic search on the knowledge base using a natural language query. Returns a scored and ranked list of the most relevant source files.

params.description: The content type to filter by. Valid values: 'all', 'blog', 'guide', 'src', 'example', 'ticket', 'release'.
params.name: type

params.description: The maximum number of results to return.
params.name: limit

returns.description: A promise that resolves to the query results object.

classData.name: queryDocuments
